Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from St. Louis to Atlanta on 4/3/1987 (Going to STL: CF Dale Murphy. Going to ATL: P Anthony Telford, 2B Delino Deshields, RF Bernard Gilkey, 3B Doug DeCinces)...
Injured on 6/11/1988 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/14/1991 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 8/22/1992, off Jamie Moyer (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/10/1992, off Bobby Thigpen (MON)...
